title: ralph-setup wizard with gum
description: Interactive gum-based wizard for adding projects, selecting MCPs, and migrating secrets. Uses 1Password skill (US-030) for migration workflows. Makes setup easy for new users installing Ralph.

acceptanceCriteria.text: ralph-setup command launches gum menu with options
Option: Add new project (auto-detects path and name from cwd)
Option: Configure MCPs (multi-select from available definitions)
Option: Migrate secrets (invokes /1password skill for .env and MCP migration)
Setup detects if 1Password CLI installed, offers to skip secrets if not
Generates .env.1password files for projects with secrets
First-run experience: detects no registry, guides through full setup
